name: Ext_R5_MeasureReport_reportingVendor
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.MeasureReport.reportingVendor for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents MeasureReport.reportingVendor from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MeasureReport|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.definition: A reference to the vendor who queried the data, calculated results and/or generated the report. The ‘reporting vendor’ is intended to represent the submitting entity when it is not the same as the reporting entity. This extension is used when the Receiver is interested in getting vendor information in the report.
element.comment: `MeasureReport.reportingVendor` has no related element in R4B:MeasureReport
